features.name: PDF Upload & Analysis
features.description: Core feature for uploading lab reports (PDFs) and extracting biomarker data using AI

features.name: Memory-Enhanced Health AI
features.description: Zep Cloud integration for persistent memory and contextual health analysis

features.name: Progressive Disclosure Dashboard
features.description: Multi-layer health insights dashboard with progressive information disclosure

features.name: Authentication & User Management
features.description: NextAuth.js based authentication with user session management

features.name: HIPAA Compliance & Security
features.description: Healthcare data compliance with encryption, audit logging, and consent management

features.name: Database Integration
features.description: Prisma ORM with Supabase PostgreSQL for health data persistence

features.name: Bioenergetic Health Analysis
features.description: Ray Peat inspired bioenergetic medicine analysis engine

features.name: Memory API Endpoints
features.description: RESTful APIs for memory management and health journey tracking

features.name: Health Assessment System
features.description: Comprehensive health assessment with scoring and recommendations

features.name: Role-Based Access Control
features.description: RBAC system for different user roles and permissions

features.name: UI Component Library
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS
